title: Historic Country Retreat with Breakfast Hamper & Bottle of Wine
description:
Take the reins on your next escape and choose a unique country retreat at historic Bungaree Station, a working farm located in the heart of South Australia’s popular Clare Valley. Surrounded by wineries and beautiful countryside, enjoy heritage accommodation with old-world charm and modern facilities. Included in your escape are daily country breakfast provisions, a bottle of local wine, an audio tour of the station complex and a leisurely noon check-out.

**Travelling with friends or family?** The two-bedroom upgrade comfortably sleeps four while the deluxe two-bedroom upgrade can accommodate a fifth guest.
